name: msgid
description: A unique message id to be used to join with posterior pipeline output tables.

name: ssvid
description: Specific Source Vessel Id. In this case the transmittor Number.

name: speed
description: SOG. Speed Over Ground in knots.

name: callsign
description: Callsign, will be empty for all records, since indo data don't include this value.

name: imo
description: IMO, will be empty for all records, since indo data don't include this value.

name: type
description: The type. VMS for all VMS records and the AIS.X for the AIS records.

name: length
description: Null in all cases, this is for compatibility with AIS pipeline.

name: width
description: Null in all cases, this is for compatibility with AIS pipeline.
